resources.string: This app has to be a system app to work. (Hint: Place it in /system/priv-app/ instead of /data/app/.)
Do you really want to enable the backup? The data of your apps (not the apps itself!) is going to be sent to a (possibly remote) location. Do you want to continue?
Do you really want to disable the backup? This will delete all your previous backups! Do you want to continue?
